Why Marcaria.com?
Personalized Support
Our awarded-wining personalized customer support is frequently recognized by our clients as one of our key attributes.
Experience
With over 15 years of experience and more than 100k clients, we are committed every day to providing exceptional service.
Selected Partners
To deliver our services in every country of the world, we rely on a trusted network of Providers and Attorneys. Our years of experience have allowed us to filter and select the best possible partners.
Procceses
We believe that having defined business processes is the base for providing an outstanding service. Our processes are periodically reviewed and audited.
Technology
Technology is moving fast, we know that we have to keep the pace. We are constantly updating and improving our platforms to meet the new demands that our services require.
Certifications
We are an ICANN accredited company with over 50 country accreditation's. These certifications imply that we have met technical, security, operational, privacy & financial requirements.
